public.getUser: select us.id_user, us.email, us.username, us.password, pr.fk_id_profile, per.name, per.last_name from security.user us INNER JOIN security.user_profile pr ON us.id_user = pr.fk_id_user inner join person as per on per.id_person = us.fk_id_person where us.email = $1 and us.deleted = false
public.createPerson: INSERT INTO public.person (name, last_name) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_person
public.getPeople: SELECT p.id_person, p.name, p.last_name, CONCAT(p.name, ' ', p.last_name) AS fullname FROM person as p
public.updatePerson: UPDATE public.person SET name = $1, last_name = $2 WHERE id_person = $3
public.updatePersonName: UPDATE person SET name = $1 WHERE id_person = $2
public.updatePersonLastName: UPDATE person SET last_name = $1 WHERE id_person = $2
public.getPersonById: SELECT * FROM public.person as p INNER JOIN security.user as u ON u.fk_id_person = p.id_person WHERE u.id_user = $1

security.loadPermission: SELECT pr.id_profile, ob.id_object, ob.object, me.id_method, me.method FROM security.permission_method pm INNER JOIN security.profile pr ON pm.fk_id_profile = pr.id_profile INNER JOIN security.method me ON pm.fk_id_method = me.id_method INNER JOIN security.object ob ON me.fk_id_object = ob.id_object
security.loadMenu: SELECT pr.id_profile, me.menu, me.fk_id_module FROM security.permission_menu pm  INNER JOIN security.profile pr ON pm.fk_id_profile = pr.id_profile INNER JOIN security.menu me ON pm.fk_id_menu = me.id_menu
security.createUser: INSERT INTO security.user (email, password, username, fk_id_person) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING id_user
security.updatePassword: UPDATE security.user SET password = $1 WHERE email = $2
security.getUserByNumberAndPassword: SELECT * FROM security.user WHERE number_id = $1 AND password = $2 AND deleted = false
security.getUserByEmail: SELECT * FROM security.user WHERE email = $1 AND deleted = false
security.getProfiles: SELECT * FROM security.profile ORDER BY id_profile
security.createProfile: INSERT INTO security.profile (profile) VALUES ($1) RETURNING id_profile, profile
security.updateProfile: UPDATE security.profile SET profile = $1 WHERE id_profile = $2 RETURNING id_profile, profile
security.deleteProfiles: DELETE FROM security.profile WHERE id_profile = ANY($1::int[])
security.getUsers: SELECT us.id_user, pe.id_person,pe.name, pe.last_name, us.email, pr.profile, pr.id_profile, pe.birth_date, us.number_id FROM security.user us INNER JOIN public.person pe ON pe.id_person = us.fk_id_person INNER JOIN security.user_profile uspr ON uspr.fk_id_user = us.id_user INNER JOIN security.profile pr ON pr.id_profile = uspr.fk_id_profile WHERE us.deleted = false
security.updateUser: UPDATE security.user SET email = $1, password = $2, username = $3 WHERE id_user = $4
security.updateUserName: UPDATE security.user SET username = $1 WHERE id_user = $2
security.updateUserPassword: UPDATE security.user SET password = $1 WHERE id_user = $2
security.updateUserEmail: UPDATE security.user SET email = $1 WHERE id_user = $2
security.updateUserProfile: UPDATE security.user_profile SET fk_id_profile = $1 WHERE fk_id_user = $2
security.deleteUser: update security.user set deleted = true where id_user = $1
security.getUserById: SELECT us.id_user, us.email, us.password, us.fk_id_person, us.username, per.name, per.last_name FROM security.user as us inner join person as per on us.fk_id_person = per.id_person WHERE id_user = $1 AND deleted = false
security.getMenus: SELECT me.id_menu, me.menu, mo.module, mo.id_module FROM security.menu me INNER JOIN security.module mo ON mo.id_module = me.fk_id_module
security.updateMenu: UPDATE security.menu SET menu = $1, fk_id_module = $2 WHERE id_menu = $3
security.deleteMenus: DELETE FROM security.menu WHERE id_menu = ANY($1::int[])
security.updateModule: UPDATE security.module SET module = $1 WHERE id_module = $2
security.deleteModules: DELETE FROM security.module WHERE id_module = ANY($1::int[])
security.getMethods: SELECT me.id_method, me.method, me.fk_id_object, ob.object FROM security.method me INNER JOIN security.object ob ON ob.id_object = me.fk_id_object
security.updateMethod: UPDATE security.method SET method = $1, fk_id_object = $2 WHERE id_method = $3
security.deleteMethods: DELETE FROM security.method WHERE id_method = ANY($1::int[])
security.getpermissionmethods: SELECT prm.id_permission_method, prm.fk_id_profile, pr.profile, prm.fk_id_method, me.method, ob.object FROM security.permission_method prm INNER JOIN security.profile pr ON pr.id_profile = prm.fk_id_profile INNER JOIN security.method me ON me.id_method = prm.fk_id_method INNER JOIN security.object ob ON ob.id_object = me.fk_id_object
security.updatePermissionMethod: UPDATE security.permission_method SET fk_id_profile = $1, fk_id_method = $2 WHERE id_permission_method = $3
security.deletePermissionMethods: DELETE FROM security.permission_method WHERE id_permission_method = ANY($1::int[])
security.getPermissionMenus: SELECT prm.id_permission_method, prm.fk_id_profile, pr.profile, prm.fk_id_menu, me.menu, mo.id_module FROM security.permission_menu prm INNER JOIN security.profile pr ON pr.id_profile = prm.fk_id_profile INNER JOIN security.menu me ON me.id_menu = prm.fk_id_menu INNER JOIN security.module mo ON mo.id_module = me.fk_id_module
security.getUserProfiles: SELECT up.fk_id_profile, p.profile FROM security.user_profile up JOIN security.profile p on up.fk_id_profile = p.id_profile JOIN security.user u ON up.fk_id_user = u.id_user WHERE u.email = $1
security.updatePermissionMenu: UPDATE security.permission_menu SET fk_id_profile = $1, fk_id_menu = $2 WHERE id_permission_method = $3
security.deletePermissionMenus: DELETE FROM security.permission_menu WHERE id_permission_method = ANY($1::int[])
security.insertAudit: INSERT INTO security.audit(fk_id_user, method, fk_id_profile, date) values($1,$2,$3,$4::TIMESTAMP)
security.getAudits: select a.id_audit, p.name, p.last_name, CONCAT(p.name, ' ', p.last_name) AS fullname, a.method, pr.id_profile, pr.profile, a.date from security.audit as a inner join security.profile as pr on pr.id_profile = a.fk_id_profile inner join security.user as u on u.id_user = a.fk_id_user inner join person as p on p.id_person = u.fk_id_person
